source_text.raw_block:
Magical Vestment (Enchantment)
Sphere: Protection
Range: Touch
Components: V, S, M
Duration: 5 rounds/level
Casting Time: 1 round
Area of Effect: The caster
Saving Throw: None
This spell enchants the caster’s vestment,
providing protection at least the equivalent
of chain mail (AC 5). The vestment gains a
+1 enchantment for each three levels of the
priest beyond 5th level, to a maximum of
AC 1 at 17th level. The magic lasts for five
rounds per level of the caster, or until the
caster loses consciousness. If the vestment is
worn with other armors, only the best AC
